comments.body: I think it's nice to show the async saving. Does this not work in batch mode, or why did you need to comment it?

SaveAs is working also in batch mode.
But if only firefox browser is installed - it will fail for a moment on batch farm without $DISPLAY.
Therefore I left out image saving
But then why not leave this protected by `if (!gROOT->IsWebDisplayBatch()) {` with a comment that this only works with Chrome or CEF or QtWebThingy in batch?
